channel.title: left 4 dead 2 new sp infected ideas?
channel.description: if you have any, this is the thread to say them in. hey! maybe we are lucky and a l4d2 dev sees this and a idea might come in-game XD. i have one. the needler. the idea of it is basicaly that it can climb on walls and it jas one big arm that is covered with forward pointing spikes that he shoots survivors from a distance. and when killed, he shoots about 20 spikes in front of him like a shotgun. and his melee attack is basicaly stabbing with the arm

item.description:

item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

Because the L4D team totally frequents these forums and accepts our shitty ideas, right?

This.
Every game idea is worthless unless you’re the one developing it. Which is why there’s a shit load of shitty ideas for Black Mesa: Source asked by “CoDfags,” since the developers are asking for ideas.
